title: A counterpoyson, or Soverain antidote against all griefe as also, the benefit of affliction and how to husband it so that the weakest Christian (with blessing from above) may be able to support himself in his most miserable exigents : together with the victory of patience : extracted out of the choicest authors, ancient and modern, both holy and humane : necessary to be read of all that any way suffer tribulation.
author: Younge, Richard.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by J.B. and S.B., and are to be sold by Philip Nevill ...,
